---
title: Big data in the agrotech industry
author: Marie-Hélène Burle
---

:::{.def}

This two-part workshop will illustrate how big data is being used in the agriculture sector and provide information that will help you get Started:

- Session 1 will demystify big data and cover case studies in the field of agriculture,
- Session 2 will help you identify your needs, show you avenues to get started, and provide you with the vocabulary and concepts necessary to communicate with consultants.

:::
